title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: members, contributors, leaders pledge make participation community harassment-free experience everyone, regardless age, body size, visible invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity expression, level experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, caste, color, religion, sexual identity orientation. pledge act interact ways contribute open, welcoming, diverse, inclusive, healthy community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders responsible clarifying enforcing standards acceptable behavior take appropriate fair corrective action response behavior deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, harmful. Community leaders right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct, communicate reasons moderation decisions appropriate.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct applies within community spaces, also applies individual officially representing community public spaces. Examples representing community include using official e-mail address, posting via official social media account, acting appointed representative online offline event.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported community leaders responsible enforcement matthew.warkentin@ucalgary.ca. complaints reviewed investigated promptly fairly. community leaders obligated respect privacy security reporter incident.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders follow Community Impact Guidelines determining consequences action deem violation Code Conduct:

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Use inappropriate language behavior deemed unprofessional unwelcome community. Consequence: private, written warning community leaders, providing clarity around nature violation explanation behavior inappropriate. public apology may requested.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: violation single incident series actions. Consequence: warning consequences continued behavior. interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, specified period time. includes avoiding interactions community spaces well external channels like social media. Violating terms may lead temporary permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: serious violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior. Consequence: temporary ban sort interaction public communication community specified period time. public private interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, allowed period. Violating terms may lead permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Demonstrating pattern violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior, harassment individual, aggression toward disparagement classes individuals. Consequence: permanent ban sort public interaction within community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant, version 2.1, available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/2/1/code_of_conduct.html. Community Impact Guidelines inspired [Mozilla’s code conduct enforcement ladder][https://github.com/mozilla/inclusion]. answers common questions code conduct, see FAQ https://www.contributor-covenant.org/faq. Translations available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/translations.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Warkentin M (2026). dpdr: Interface Health Canada Drug Product Database API. R package version 0.1.0, https://github.com/mattwarkentin/dpdr.
code: @Manual{,   title = {dpdr: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API},   author = {Matthew T. Warkentin},   year = {2026},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://github.com/mattwarkentin/dpdr}, }

what: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API
title: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API
text: goal dpdr provide programmatic interface Health Canada’s Drug Product Database (DPD) REST API query information drugs approved use Canada. information DPD can found API guide (https://health-products.canada.ca/api/documentation/dpd-documentation-en.html).

title: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API
text: can install development version dpdr GitHub :
code: # install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("mattwarkentin/dpdr")

title: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API
text: 11 API endpoints part Health Canada’s Drug Product Database API. endpoints demonstrated following sections.
code: library(dpdr)

title: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API
text: can search active ingredient information based drug code… based name drug.
code: dpd_active_ingredient(id = 48905) #> # A tibble: 23 × 6 #>    dosage_unit dosage_value drug_code ingredient_name     strength strength_unit #>    <chr>       <chr>            <int> <chr>               <chr>    <chr>         #>  1 ""          ""               48905 FOLIC ACID          0.2      MG            #>  2 ""          ""               48905 BIOTIN              75       MCG           #>  3 ""          ""               48905 VITAMIN B12         9        MCG           #>  4 ""          ""               48905 ASCORBIC ACID       125      MG            #>  5 ""          ""               48905 VITAMIN D2 (VITAMI… 200      UNIT          #>  6 ""          ""               48905 VITAMIN E           200      UNIT          #>  7 ""          ""               48905 CHOLINE             5        MG            #>  8 ""          ""               48905 INOSITOL            5        MG            #>  9 ""          ""               48905 COPPER (CUPRIC OXI… 1.5      MG            #> 10 ""          ""               48905 IODINE (POTASSIUM … 0.075    MG            #> # ℹ 13 more rows dpd_active_ingredient(name = "afatinib") #> # A tibble: 12 × 6 #>    dosage_unit dosage_value drug_code ingredient_name     strength strength_unit #>    <chr>       <chr>            <int> <chr>               <chr>    <chr>         #>  1 ""          ""               90026 AFATINIB (AFATINIB… 20       MG            #>  2 ""          ""              100392 AFATINIB (AFATINIB… 30       MG            #>  3 ""          ""              100203 AFATINIB (AFATINIB… 20       MG            #>  4 ""          ""              100393 AFATINIB (AFATINIB… 40       MG            #>  5 ""          ""              100637 AFATINIB (AFATINIB… 40       MG            #>  6 ""          ""              100636 AFATINIB (AFATINIB… 30       MG            #>  7 ""          ""               90027 AFATINIB (AFATINIB… 30       MG            #>  8 ""          ""              100205 AFATINIB (AFATINIB… 40       MG            #>  9 ""          ""              100204 AFATINIB (AFATINIB… 30       MG            #> 10 ""          ""              100391 AFATINIB (AFATINIB… 20       MG            #> 11 ""          ""              100635 AFATINIB (AFATINIB… 20       MG            #> 12 ""          ""               90028 AFATINIB (AFATINIB… 40       MG

title: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API
text: can search information drug company:
code: dpd_company(10825) #> # A tibble: 1 × 10 #>   city_name  company_code company_name company_type country_name post_office_box #>   <chr>             <int> <chr>        <chr>        <chr>        <chr>           #> 1 Mississau…        10825 PAX-ALL MAN… DIN OWNER    Canada       ""              #> # ℹ 4 more variables: postal_code <chr>, province_name <chr>, #> #   street_name <chr>, suite_number <chr>

title: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API
text: family drug product functions allow us query information drug products based drug product code drug identification number (DIN). can also find list drugs based drugs product status. , can find list drugs based brand names.
code: dpd_drug_product(id = 2049) #> # A tibble: 1 × 9 #>   drug_code class_name drug_identification_number brand_name descriptor #>       <int> <chr>      <chr>                      <chr>      <chr>      #> 1      2049 Human      00326925                   SINEQUAN   ""         #> # ℹ 4 more variables: number_of_ais <chr>, ai_group_no <chr>, #> #   company_name <chr>, last_update_date <chr> dpd_drug_product(din = '00326925') #> # A tibble: 1 × 9 #>   drug_code class_name drug_identification_number brand_name descriptor #>       <int> <chr>      <chr>                      <chr>      <chr>      #> 1      2049 Human      00326925                   SINEQUAN   ""         #> # ℹ 3,950 more rows #> # ℹ 4 more variables: number_of_ais <chr>, ai_group_no <chr>, #> #   company_name <chr>, last_update_date <chr> dpd_drug_product(brandname = "cidyl") #> # A tibble: 3 × 9 #>   drug_code class_name drug_identification_number brand_name         descriptor #>       <int> <chr>      <chr>                      <chr>              <chr>      #> 1       225 Human      00000019                   PLACIDYL CAP 200MG ""         #> 2       226 Human      00000027                   PLACIDYL CAP 500MG ""         #> 3      1245 Human      00228893                   PLACIDYL CAP 750MG ""         #> # ℹ 4 more variables: number_of_ais <chr>, ai_group_no <chr>, #> #   company_name <chr>, last_update_date <chr>

title: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API
text: dosage form form presentation product supplied. can query dosage form based drug product code.
code: dpd_dosage_form(10846) #> # A tibble: 2 × 3 #>   drug_code pharmaceutical_form_code pharmaceutical_form_name #>       <int>                    <int> <chr>                    #> 1     10846                       34 Liquid                   #> 2     10846                       43 Ointment

text: can query information package sizes based drug product code.
code: dpd_packaging(11685) #> # A tibble: 1 × 6 #>   drug_code upc   package_size_unit package_type package_size #>       <int> <chr> <chr>             <chr>        <chr>        #> 1     11685 ""    ""                ""           ""           #> # ℹ 1 more variable: product_information <chr>

title: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API
text: can query standard drug product manufactured represented, based drug product code.
code: dpd_pharm_standard(11534) #> # A tibble: 1 × 2 #>   drug_code pharmaceutical_std #>       <int> <chr>              #> 1     11534 MFR

title: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API
text: can query route administration drug based drug product code.
code: dpd_route_of_admin(3) #> # A tibble: 5 × 3 #>   drug_code route_of_administration_code route_of_administration_name #>       <int>                        <int> <chr>                        #> 1         3                           33 Intraperitoneal              #> 2         3                           49 Intravenous                  #> 3         3                           31 Intrathecal                  #> 4         3                           34 Intrapleural                 #> 5         3                           10 Intra-Articular

title: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API
text: drug assigned one schedules, can query based drug product code (see ?dpd_schedule information).
code: dpd_schedule(10687) #> # A tibble: 2 × 2 #>   drug_code schedule_name #>       <int> <chr>         #> 1     10687 SCHEDULE D    #> 2     10687 PRESCRIPTION

title: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API
text: can query product status drug product.
code: dpd_product_status() #> # A tibble: 57,788 × 7 #>    drug_code status       history_date original_market_date external_status_code #>        <int> <chr>        <chr>        <chr>                               <int> #>  1      4264 Cancelled P… 1998-09-25   1978-12-31                              4 #>  2      3460 Cancelled P… 1996-09-09   1979-12-31                              4 #>  3      3466 Cancelled P… 2019-05-27   1979-12-31                              4 #>  4      3776 Cancelled P… 1998-09-25   1980-12-31                              4 #>  5      4343 Cancelled P… 1997-05-30   1981-12-31                              4 #>  6      3797 Cancelled (… 2023-01-09   1979-12-31                              9 #>  7      3509 Cancelled P… 2004-08-16   1979-12-31                              4 #>  8      4079 Cancelled P… 1997-08-13   1963-12-31                              4 #>  9      4083 Cancelled P… 1998-07-09   1981-12-31                              4 #> 10      4084 Cancelled P… 2001-08-02   1963-12-31                              4 #> # ℹ 57,778 more rows #> # ℹ 2 more variables: expiration_date <chr>, lot_number <chr>

title: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API
text: can query Therapeutic Class according drugs main therapeutic use.
code: dpd_therapeutic_class(10564) #> # A tibble: 1 × 5 #>   drug_code tc_atc_number tc_atc                  tc_ahfs_number tc_ahfs #>       <int> <chr>         <chr>                   <chr>          <chr>   #> 1     10564 V07AV         TECHNICAL DISINFECTANTS ""             ""

title: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API
text: Lastly, can query species drug product based veterinary drug product code.
code: dpd_vet_species(13755) #> # A tibble: 3 × 2 #>   drug_code vet_species_name #>       <int> <chr>            #> 1     13755 Horses           #> 2     13755 Cats             #> 3     13755 Dogs

title: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API
text: Please note dpdr project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project, agree abide terms.

title: Active Ingredient — dpd_active_ingredient
text: Active Ingredient component medicinal properties, supplies pharmacological activity direct effect diagnosis, cure, mitigation, treatment prevention disease, affect structure function body human animal.

title: Active Ingredient — dpd_active_ingredient
code: dpd_active_ingredient(id, name, lang = c("en", "fr"))

title: Active Ingredient — dpd_active_ingredient
text: id Drug product code. name Ingredient name. lang Language response. One "en" "fr" English French, respectively.

title: Active Ingredient — dpd_active_ingredient
text: tibble columns: dosage_unit: Active ingredient dosage unit. dosage_value: Quantitative value active ingredient dosage. drug_code: Code assigned drug product. ingredient_name: Ingredient name. strength: Quantitative value active ingredient strength. strength_unit: Active ingredient strength unit.

title: Active Ingredient — dpd_active_ingredient
text: name strength active ingredient contained product listed. Information enclosed within brackets represents salt identifies ingredient supplied. information included ingredients. number strength field refers active portion drug. example, calcium (calcium carbonate) 200 milligram (mg) - 200 mg strength elemental calcium, calcium carbonate. Health Canada reference text hierarchy ingredient nomenclature. International Non Proprietary Names (INN) used Health Canada's standard assign preferred name ingredients. standards United States Adopted Names (USAN), Martindale, Merck Index, etc., used code ingredients listed INN.

title: Company — dpd_company
text: Company information associated company code.

title: Company — dpd_company
code: dpd_company(id, lang = c("en", "fr"))

title: Company — dpd_company
text: id Company code. lang Language response. One "en" "fr" English French, respectively.

title: Company — dpd_company
text: tibble columns: city_name: City name. company_code: Code assigned company. company_name: Company name. company_type: Company type. country_name: Country name. post_office_box: P.O. box number (applicable). postal_code: Postal code. province_name: Province name. street_name: Street name. suite_number: Suite number.

title: Company — dpd_company
text: DPD, product may several companies associated . product DIN Owner associated . DIN Owner designated another company receive mailing, name address also included can identified 'Y' flag ADDRESS_MAILING_FLAG field. company contact information included API (ATTENTION_TO, LANGUAGE, TELEPHONE_NUMBER, FAX_NUMBER, EMAIL_ADDRESS). contact information database generally representative Regulatory Affairs department. come attention users contacting individuals make general inquiries, like recommend .

title: Company — dpd_company
code: dpd_company(10825) #> # A tibble: 1 × 10 #>   city_name  company_code company_name company_type country_name post_office_box #>   <chr>             <int> <chr>        <chr>        <chr>        <chr>           #> 1 Mississau…        10825 PAX-ALL MAN… DIN OWNER    Canada       ""              #> # ℹ 4 more variables: postal_code <chr>, province_name <chr>, #> #   street_name <chr>, suite_number <chr>

title: Dosage Form — dpd_dosage_form
text: dosage form form presentation product supplied, example, tablet, capsule, powder, etc.

title: Dosage Form — dpd_dosage_form
code: dpd_dosage_form(id, active = FALSE, lang = c("en", "fr"))

title: Dosage Form — dpd_dosage_form
text: id Drug product code. active return dosage forms active? Default FALSE. lang Language response. One "en" "fr" English French, respectively.

title: Dosage Form — dpd_dosage_form
text: tibble columns: drug_code: Code assigned drug product. pharmaceutical_form_code: Code assigned dosage form. pharmaceutical_form_name: Dosage form.

title: Dosage Form — dpd_dosage_form
text: product can one dosage form kit (e.g. tablet, capsule).

title: Dosage Form — dpd_dosage_form
code: dpd_dosage_form(10846) #> # A tibble: 2 × 3 #>   drug_code pharmaceutical_form_code pharmaceutical_form_name #>       <int>                    <int> <chr>                    #> 1     10846                       34 Liquid                   #> 2     10846                       43 Ointment

title: Drug Product — dpd_drug_product
text: Basic information product, brand name Drug Identification Number.

title: Drug Product — dpd_drug_product
code: dpd_drug_product(id, din, brandname, status, lang = c("en", "fr"))

title: Drug Product — dpd_drug_product
text: id Drug product code. din Drug Identification Number (DIN). brandname Brand name. status Drug product status. See Details section. lang Language response. One "en" "fr" English French, respectively.

title: Drug Product — dpd_drug_product
text: tibble columns: ai_group_no: Active Ingredient Group Number. brand_name: Brand name drug product. class_name: Therapeutic class drug product. descriptor: Additional details descriptions product, applicable. drug_code: Code assigned drug product. drug_identification_number: Drug Identification Number. number_of_ais: Number Active Ingredients drug product. company_name: Company name. last_update_date: Date updated time certain, , key fields changed.

title: Drug Product — dpd_drug_product
text: status must integer, corresponding following statuses: 1: Approved 2: Marketed 3: Cancelled Pre Market 4: Cancelled Post Market 6: Dormant 9: Cancelled (Unreturned Annual) 10: Cancelled (Safety Issue) 11: Authorized Interim Order 12: Authorization Interim Order Revoked 13: Restricted Access 14: Authorization Interim Order Expired 15: Cancelled (Transitioned Biocides)

title: Schedule — dpd_schedule
text: id Drug product code. lang Language response. One "en" "fr" English French, respectively.

title: Schedule — dpd_schedule
text: tibble columns: drug_code: Code assigned drug product. schedule_name: Drug schedule according Food Drug Regulations Controlled Drugs Substances Act.

title: Schedule — dpd_schedule
text: drug assigned one schedules, according Food Drug Regulations, Controlled Drugs Substances Act. Prescription (prescription drugs included Prescription Drug List) Prescription Recommended (drugs recommended listed Prescription Drug List) Schedule G (control drugs) Schedule G (Controlled Drugs Substances Act (CDSA) III) Schedule G (CDSA IV) Schedule C (drugs listed Schedule C Food Drugs Act, example, radiopharmaceutical drugs) Schedule D (drugs listed Schedule D Food Drugs Act, ie. biological products) Narcotic (Narcotic Control Act) Narcotic (CDSA )S Narcotic (CDSA II) Targeted (CDSA IV) CDSA Recommended- Undergoing Regulatory Amendment add new substance Controlled Drugs Substances Act OTC (counter drugs appear schedule recommended appear schedule) Ethical: drug , accordance Federal Legislation, require prescription, generally prescribed medical practitioner. Ethical products unscheduled non-prescription professional use products (e.g. MRI contrast agents, hemodialysis solutions) emergency use products (e.g. nitroglycerine)

title: Schedule — dpd_schedule

what: dpdr: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API — dpdr-package
title: dpdr: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API — dpdr-package
text: programmatic interface Health Canada's Drug Product Database (DPD) REST API querying information drugs approved use Canada. information DPD can found API guide (https://health-products.canada.ca/api/documentation/dpd-documentation-en.html).

title: dpdr: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API — dpdr-package
text: Maintainer: Matthew T. Warkentin matthew.warkentin@ucalgary.ca (ORCID) [copyright holder]

text: Initial public release.
